headline: Hasbro tops Q3 estimates, CEO talks cheery outlook on toy sales
summary: Toy giant Hasbro (HAS) topped third quarter estimates with adjusted earnings per share of $1.68 (vs. estimates of $1.63) and revenue of $1.39 billion (vs. estimates of $1.34 billion). Hasbro CEO Chris Cocks sits down with Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi to discuss the buying power he is still seeing from American consumers across its product lines, the company's forecast ahead of the holiday shopping season, its ability to navigate tariffs, and its collaboration with major companies on toy lines such as Disney (DIS) and Netflix's (NFLX) KPop Demon Hunters. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: S&P 500 Futures Rise as Rate Cut Bets Grow
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Thursday, Oct, 23 2025 US stock futures started mixed this morning, with investors watching rate-sensitive stocks closely as the market digests falling Treasury yields and mounting confidence in a Federal Reserve rate cut next week. As monetary policy expectations shift and a surprise drawdown in crude oil inventories raises questions around supply, sentiment remains cautious. headline: Netflix (NFLX): Earnings Growth Tops 34%, Reinforcing Bullish Narratives on Profitability and Momentum
summary: Netflix (NFLX) reported robust results, with earnings growth over the past year hitting 34.1%, a sharp acceleration above its five-year average of 22.3% per year. Net profit margins climbed to 24%, up from last year's 20.7%. Analysts are projecting revenue to rise 10.7% annually and EPS to grow 17.5% per year, both outpacing US market benchmarks. With high-quality earnings, strong momentum, and the stock still trading below analyst price targets, investors are seeing a compelling blend of...

headline: Netflix’s stock price sent reeling after Q3 earnings

The decline resulted from a one-time $619 million tax charge related to a Brazilian tax dispute, which impacted profits ...
